Text:
Hi

Downloading it; will try & will be back for comments.

OK Guys

There was a problem in activation.

The upload is OK but not everyone of us has enough idea for the workaround during the installation & activation process.

So I am explaining it here. Hope it would be help. 

what you have to do is as follows;

1. Decompress the file downloaded (picturestoexe.deluxe.7.0.6.rar) with winrar or 7zip.
2. Install the application by double clicking on the file (picturestoexe-setup.exe)
3. Close the registration dialog box
4. Copy the file (info.dat) from PicturesToExe Deluxe 7.0.6 + Crack + Serialcrack7.0Main to install directory by replacing the existing.
((In windows 7 this file can be found at C:Program FilesWnSoft PicturesToExe7.0Main))
5. Run the registry entery file called (PicturesToExe.reg) as an Administrator which can be found in Crack folder.
6. Run the program & enter the key
P72I7-VMC3A-U2IIM-FJBX7-YVS9K

The application PicturesToExe Deluxe 7.0.6 would be activated.

Have fun guy & Thanks mrrriser007 for the upload.
